thread.title: Education secretary Nicky Morgan hints at Osborne tax credits retreat
thread.title_full: Education secretary Nicky Morgan hints at Osborne tax credits retreat

title: Education secretary Nicky Morgan hints at Osborne tax credits retreat
text:
To see the full article you need to subscribe Subscribe 
David Cameron has consistently ruled it out Jeremy Hunt , the health secretary, is opposed but is less implacable George Freeman , the health minister, backed a tax until he was brought into line by No 10 Simon Stevens , head of NHS England, is relaxed about a tax as long as there is "comprehensive" anti-obesity action The Food and Drink Federation opposes a tax Public Health England is in favour of a tax Behind the story: 
George Osborne is expected to offer extra help for workers worst affected by tax credit changes, cabinet ministers... Last updated at October 24 2015 
Figures in Number 10 are signalling to MPs that the government is open to giving additional help to those worst... Last updated at October 22 2015 
Ministers are considering help for working families affected by tax credit cuts despite David Cameron insisting... Last updated at October 5 2015 Related topics:
